pr_title: Provides a helper to conveniently check permissions on an entity with…

timeline.message:
Provides a helper to conveniently check permissions on an entity without relying on a UserManager or the like to transform them.

In some cases we only have the database entity at hands and need to reason about granted permissions. We still want to
utilize the profiles and other facilities to conveniently work with permissions. This is now provided by getEffectivePermissions
and hasPermission.
